title: React
description: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces. React makes it painless to create interactive UIs with a component-based architecture.

title: TypeScript
description: TypeScript is a strongly typed programming language that builds on JavaScript, giving you better tooling at any scale.

title: Vue.js
description: The Progressive JavaScript Framework. An incrementally adoptable ecosystem that scales between a library and a full-featured framework.

title: Svelte
description: Cybernetically enhanced web apps. A radical new approach to building user interfaces with compile-time optimizations.

title: Deno
description: A modern runtime for JavaScript and TypeScript. Secure by default with built-in TypeScript support.

title: Bun
description: Fast all-in-one JavaScript runtime. Bundle, test, and run JavaScript & TypeScript projects with Bun.

title: Vite
description: Next generation frontend tooling. Fast build tool with lightning fast HMR and optimized build process.

title: Turbo
description: The high-performance build system for JavaScript and TypeScript codebases. Incremental bundler and build system optimizer.

title: Astro
description: The web framework for content-driven websites. Build fast websites with less client-side JavaScript.

title: Remix
description: Full stack web framework focused on web fundamentals and modern UX. Built on React Router with server-side rendering.

title: Qwik
description: The HTML-first framework. Designed for the edge with resumability and fine-grained lazy loading.

title: SolidJS
description: Simple and performant reactivity for building user interfaces. Fine-grained reactivity with minimal overhead.
